titles_json.FR:
LIVE "Subsidiarity - as a building principle of the European Union"
Conference in Bregenz, Austria - Welcome, keynote speech and interviews
titles_json.EN:
LIVE "Subsidiarity - as a building principle of the European Union"
Conference in Bregenz, Austria - Welcome, keynote speech and interviews

summary_json.FR: - Welcome to the political segment by Gernot BLÜMEL, Austrian Federal Minister for the EU, Arts, Culture and Media - Keynote speech by  Frans TIMMERMANS, First Vice-President of the EC in charge of Better Regulation, Inter-Institutional Relations, the Rule of Law and the Charter of Fundamental Rights, and Chairman of the Task Force on Subsidiarity, Proportionality and "Doing Less More Efficiently" - Interviews Melania-Gabriela CIOT, Romania Secretary of State for European Affairs at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Karl-Heinz LAMBERTZ, President of the Committee of the Regions Markus WALLNER, Landeshauptmann of Vorarlberg
summary_json.EN: - Welcome to the political segment by Gernot BLÜMEL, Austrian Federal Minister for the EU, Arts, Culture and Media - Keynote speech by  Frans TIMMERMANS, First Vice-President of the EC in charge of Better Regulation, Inter-Institutional Relations, the Rule of Law and the Charter of Fundamental Rights, and Chairman of the Task Force on Subsidiarity, Proportionality and "Doing Less More Efficiently" - Interviews Melania-Gabriela CIOT, Romania Secretary of State for European Affairs at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs Karl-Heinz LAMBERTZ, President of the Committee of the Regions Markus WALLNER, Landeshauptmann of Vorarlberg
